arabicText: لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ قَدْ كَفَرْتُم بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِكُمْ ۚ إِن نَّعْفُ عَن طَآئِفَةٍۢ مِّنكُمْ نُعَذِّبْ طَآئِفَةًۢ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Do	 not	 feign	 excuses,	 you	 have	 turned	
disbelievers	 after	 becoming	 Muslims”;	 if	
We	forgive	some	of	you	*,	We	shall	punish	
others	 because	 they	 were	 guilty.	
(*	One	who	kept	quiet	and	later	repented.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bahāne	 na	 banāo	 tum	 kāfir	 ho	 chuke	 Musalman	 hokar	 agar	 hum	 tum	 meiñ	 se	 kisi	 ko	 mu'āf	
kareiñ		to	auroñ	ko	‘aƶāb	deñge	is	liye	ke	woh	mujrim	they.

arabicText: ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ بَعْضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَقْبِضُونَ أَيْدِيَهُمْ ۚ نَسُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 hypocrite	 men	 and	 women	 are	 all	 the	 same;	 enjoining	 wrong	 and	 forbidding	 right,	 and	
being	 tight-fisted	 *;	 they	 have	 forgotten	 Allah,	 so	 Allah has	 forsaken	 them;	 indeed	 the	
hypocrites	- it	is	they	who	are	really	disobedient.	(*	Not	spending	in	Allah's	cause)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Munafiq	mard	aur	munafiq	aurteiñ	ek	thaili	ke	chatte	batte	(ek	jaise)	haiñ	burāyi	ka	ḥukm	deñ	
aur	 bhalāyi	 se	man’a	 kareiñ aur	apni	muth-thi	 band	 rakheiñ	 (kharch	 na	 kareñ)	woh	Allah	 ko	
chhord	 baithe	 to	 Allah	 ne	 unheiñ	 chhord	 diya	 be-shak	 munafiq	 wohi	 pakke	 be-ḥukm	 (Na	
farmān)	haiñ.

arabicText: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ هِىَ حَسْبُهُمْ ۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّقِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	 promised	 the	 hypocrite	men	and	 hypocrite	women	and	 the	 disbelievers,	 the	 fire	 of	
hell	 in	 which	 they	 will	 remain	 forever;	 that	 is	 sufficient	 for	 them;	 and	Allah’s	 curse	 is	 upon	
them;	and	for	them	is	a	never	ending	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	munafiq	mardoñ	aur	munafiq	aurtoñ	aur	kāfiroñ	ko	jahannam	ki	āag	ka	w’ada		diya	hai	
jis	meiñ	hamesha	raheñge	woh	unheiñ	bus	(kafi)	hai	aur	Allah	ki	un	par	l’anat	hai	aur	unke	liye	
qāim	rehne	wāla	‘aƶāb	hai

arabicText: كَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنكُمْ قُوَّةًۭ وَأَكْثَرَ أَمْوَٰلًۭا وَأَوْلَـٰدًۭا فَٱسْتَمْتَعُوا۟ بِخَلَـٰقِهِمْ فَٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِخَلَـٰقِكُمْ كَمَا ٱسْتَمْتَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُم بِخَلَـٰقِهِمْ وَخُضْتُمْ كَٱلَّذِى خَاضُوٓا۟ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Like	 those	 who	 were	 before	 you	 - they	
were	 mightier	 than	 you	 in	 strength,	 and	
had	 more	 wealth	 and	 children	 than	 you;	
so	 they	 spent	 their	 portion	 - you	 spent	
your	 portion	 just	 as	 those	 before	 you	
spent	 their	 portion	 and	 you	 fell	 into	
shame	 (sin)	 like	 they	 had	 fallen	 into	
shame;	 their	 deeds	 have	 been	 wasted	 in	
the	world	and	in	 the	Hereafter;	it	is	 they	
who	are	the	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jaise	woh	jo	tum	se	pehle	they	tum	se	zor	
meiñ	 badh	 kar	 they	 aur	 unke	 māl	 aur	
aulād	 tum	 se	 ziyada	 to	 woh	 apna	 hissa	
barat	 (faida	 utha)	 gaye	 to	 tum	 ne	 apna	
hissa	 barta	 jaise	 agle	 apna	 hissa	 barat	
gaye	 aur	 tum	 be-hoodgi	 meiñ	 pade	 jaise	
woh	 pade	 they	 unke	 ‘amal	 akārat	 (zāye)	
gaye	 duniya	 aur	 āakhirat	 meiñ	 aur	 wohi	
log	ghāte	meiñ	haiñ.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَأْتِهِمْ نَبَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَوْمِ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٍۢ وَثَمُودَ وَقَوْمِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَأَصْحَـٰبِ مَدْيَنَ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتِ ۚ أَتَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظْلِمَهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Did	 not	 the	 news	 of	 those	 before	 them	
reach	 them	- the	people	of	Nooh,	and	 the	
A’ad,	 and	 the	 Thamud	 - the	 people	 of	
Ibrahim,	 the	 people	 of Madyan	 and	 the	
dwellings	 that	 were	 overturned?	 Their	
Noble	 Messengers	 had	 brought	 clear	
proofs	 to	 them;	 so	it	 did	 not	 befit	Allah’s	
Majesty	 to	oppress	 them,	but	in	 fact	 they	
wronged	themselves.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	 unheiñ	 apne	 se	 agloñ	 ki	 khabar	 na	
āayi	 Nooh ki	 qaum	 aur	 Āad aur	 Samood
aur	 Ibraheem ki	 qaum	 aur	 Madyan	 wāle	
aur	 woh	 bastiyāñ	 ke	 ulat	 di	 gayiñ	 unke:	
Rasool	 Raushan	 Daleeleiñ	 unke	 pās	 lāye	
they	to	Allah	ki	shān	na	thi	ke	un	par	zulm	
karta	 balke	 woh	 khud	 hi	 apni	 jānoñ	 par	
zālim	they

arabicText: وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتُ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَيُطِيعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَيَرْحَمُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	Muslim	men	and	Muslim	women	
are	 the	 friends	 of	 one	 another;	 enjoining	
right	 and	 forbidding	 wrong,	 and	 keeping	
the	 prayer	 established	 and	 paying	 the	
obligatory	 charity,	 obeying	Allah and	His	
Noble	 Messenger;	 these	 are	 upon	 whom	
Allah will	 soon	 have	mercy;	indeed	Allah
is	the	Almighty,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Musalman	mard	aur	Musalman	aurteiñ	ek	doosre	ke	rafeeq	haiñ	bhalāyi	ka	ḥukm deñ	aur	
burāyi	 se	 man’a	 kareiñ aur	Namāz	 qāim	 rakheiñ	 aur	 Zakāt	 deñ	 aur	 Allah-o-Rasool	 ka	 ḥukm		
māneiñ	yeh	haiñ	jin	par	‘an-qareeb	Allah	rahem	karega	be-shak		Allah	ghalib	hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةًۭ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ ۚ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	promised	the	Muslim	men	and	Muslim	women,	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	flow	-
they	will	abide	in	it	forever	- and	pure	dwellings	in	Gardens	of	everlasting	stay;	and	the	greatest	
(reward)	is	Allah’s	pleasure;	this	is	the	supreme	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Allah	 ne	Musalman	mardoñ	 aur	Musalman	 aurtoñ	 ko	 bāghoñ	 ka	 w’āda diya	 hai	jinke	 neeche	
nehreiñ		rawāñ	un	meiñ	hamesha	raheñge	aur	pakeeza	makānoñ	ka	basne	ke	bāghoñ	meiñ	aur	
Allah	ki	raza	sab	se	badi	yehi	hai	badi	murād	pāni.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ جَـٰهِدِ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
O	Herald	of	 the	Hidden!	Fight	against	 the	
disbelievers	 and	 the	 hypocrites,	 and	 be	
stern	 with	 them;	 and	 their	 destination	
hell;	and	what	an	evil	place	to	return!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Ghaib	 ki	 Khabreiñ	 dene	 Wāle	 (Nabi)!
jihād	 farmāo	 kāfiroñ	 aur	 munafiqoñ	 par	
aur	 un	 par	 sakhti	 karo	 aur	 unka	 thikāna	
dozakh	 hai	 aur	 kya	 hi	 buri	 jagah	 palatne	
ki.

arabicText: يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُوا۟ وَلَقَدْ قَالُوا۟ كَلِمَةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ وَكَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِسْلَـٰمِهِمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِمَا لَمْ يَنَالُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا نَقَمُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ أَنْ أَغْنَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۚ فَإِن يَتُوبُوا۟ يَكُ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
. And	they	swear	by	Allah that	they	did	not	
say	it;	whereas	indeed	 they	had	certainly	
uttered	 the	 words	 of	 disbelief,	 and	 after	
having	 entered	 Islam	 turned	 disbelievers	
and	had	wished	for	what	they	did	not	get;	
and	what	annoyed	them	except	that	Allah,	
and	 His	 Noble	 Messenger,	 made	 them	
prosperous	 with	 His	 grace?	 So	 if	 they	
repent,	 it	 is	 better	 for	 them;	 and	 if	 they	
turn	 away,	 Allah will	 afflict	 them	 with	 a	
painful	punishment	- in	this	world	and	the	
Hereafter;	 and	 they	 will	 have	 neither	 a	
protector	nor	any	supporter	in	 the	entire	
earth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	qasam	khāte	haiñ	ke	unhoñ	ne	na	
kahā	aur	be-shak		zaroor	unhoñ	ne	kufr	ki	
bāt	 kahi	 aur	 islam	 meiñ	 āakar	 kāfir	
hogaye	 aur	 woh	 chāha	 tha	 jo	 unheiñ	 na	
mila	aur	unheiñ	 kya	bura	laga	 yehi	na	 ke	
Allah-o-Rasool	 ne	 unheiñ	 apne	 fazl	 se	
ghani	 kar	 diya	 to	 agar	 woh	 tauba	 kareiñ		
to	unka	bhala	hai	aur	agar	moñh	phereiñ	
to	Allah	unheiñ	sakht	‘aƶāb	karega	duniya	
aur	āakhirat	meiñ	aur	zameen meiñ	koi	na	
unka	himayati	hoga	na	madad-gār.

arabicText: ۞ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ عَـٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنْ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 among	 them	 are	 those	 who	 made	 a	
covenant	 with	 Allah that,	 “If He	 gives	 us	
by	 His	 munificence,	 we	 will	 surely	 give	
charity	and	surely	become	righteous.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	koi	woh	haiñ	Jinhoñ	ne	Allah	
se	‘ahed	kiya	tha	ke	agar	hameiñ	apne	fazl	
se	 dega	 to	 hum	 zaroor	 khairāt	 kareñge	
aur	hum	zaroor	bhale	āadmi	ho	jāyeñge.

arabicText: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ بَخِلُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	 when	 Allah gave	 them	 by	 His	
munificence,	 they	 hoarded	it	and	 turning	
their	 faces,	 went	 back.*	 (*	 Reneged	 on	
their	promise).
romanUrduTranslationText:
. To	jab	Allah	ne	unheiñ	apne	fazl	se	diya	us	
meiñ	bukhl	karne	lage	aur	moñh	pher	kar	
palat	gaye.

arabicText: فَأَعْقَبَهُمْ نِفَاقًۭا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخْلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	following	this,	Allah put	hypocrisy	in	their	hearts	until	the	day	when	they	will	meet	Him	- the	
result	of	their	breaching	the	promise	made	to	Allah,	and	because	they	lied
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	uske	peechhe	Allah	ne	unke	diloñ	meiñ	nifāq	rakh	diya	us	din	tak	ke	us	se	mileñge	badla	iska	
ke	unhoñ	ne	Allah	se	w’āda		jhoota	kiya	aur	badla	iska	ke	jhoot	bolte	they.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
englishTranslationText:
. Do	they	not	know	that	Allah knows	their	secrets	and	the	schemes	they	whisper,	and	that	Allah
is	the	All	Knowing	of	all	the	hidden?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	unheiñ	khabar	nahi	ke	Allah	unke	dil	ki	chhupi	aur	unki	sargoshi	ko	jānta	hai	aur	yeh	ke	
Allah	sab	ghaiboñ	ka	bahut	jānne	wāla	hai.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَلْمِزُونَ ٱلْمُطَّوِّعِينَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهْدَهُمْ فَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنْهُمْ ۙ سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنْهُمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	find	fault	in	the	Muslims	who	give	the	charity	wholeheartedly	and	in	those	who	gain	
nothing	 except	 from	 their	 own	 toil	- so	 they	 mock	 at	 them;	Allah will	 punish	 them	 for	 their	
mocking;	and	for	them	is	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	‘aib	lagāte	haiñ	un	musalmanoñ		ko	ke	dil	se	khairāt	karte	haiñ	aur	unko	jo	nahi	pāte	
magar	apni	mehnat	se	to	un	se	hañste	haiñ	Allah	unki	hañsi	ki	saza	dega	aur	unke	liye	dard-nāk	
‘aƶāb	hai.

arabicText: ٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ أَوْ لَا تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ إِن تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ سَبْعِينَ مَرَّةًۭ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Whether	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad
- peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 ask	
forgiveness	 for	 them	 *	 or	 not	 ask	
forgiveness	 for	 them;	 even	 if	 you	 ask	
forgiveness	 for	 them	seventy	 times,	Allah
will	not	forgive	them;	that	is	because	they	
disbelieved	 in	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messenger,	 and	Allah does	 not	 guide	 the	
sinful.	(*	for	the	hypocrites.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 unki	mu'āfi	 chāho	 ya	 na	 chāho	 agar	
tum	 sattar	 bār	 un	 ki	 mu'āfi	 chāhoge	 to	
Allah	 hargiz	 unheiñ	 nahi	 bakhshe	 ga	 yeh	
is	 liye	 ke	 woh	 Allah	 aur	 uske	 Rasool	 se	
munkir	 huwe	 aur	 Allah	 fāsiqon	 ko	 rāh	
nahi	deta

arabicText: فَرِحَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ بِمَقْعَدِهِمْ خِلَـٰفَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَرِهُوٓا۟ أَن يُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَنفِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَرِّ ۗ قُلْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ أَشَدُّ حَرًّۭا ۚ لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	were	left	behind	rejoiced	 that	
behind	the	Noble	Messenger	of	Allah they	
had	 remained	 seated,	 and	 they	 were	
unwilling	 to	 fight	 in	 Allah's	 cause	 with	
their	 lives	 or	 their	 wealth,	 and	 said	 “Do	
not	venture	out	in	the	heat”;	say,	“The	fire	
of	 hell	 is	 the	 hottest”;	 if	 only	 they	
understood!
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Peechhe	reh	jāne	wāle	is	par	khush	huwe	
ke	woh	Rasool	ke	peechhe	baith	rahe	aur	
unheiñ	gawara	 na	 huwa	 ke	apne	māl	aur	
jān	se	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladein	aur	bole	is	
garmi	 meiñ	 na	 niklo	 tum	 farmāo		
jahannam	 ki	 āag	 sab	 se	 sakht	 garam	 hai	
kisi	tarah	unheiñ	samajh	hoti.

arabicText: فَلْيَضْحَكُوا۟ قَلِيلًۭا وَلْيَبْكُوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 they	 should	 laugh	 a	 little	 and	 weep	
much;	 the	 reward	 of	 what	 they	 used	 to	
earn.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 unheiñ	 chāhiye	 ke	 thoda	 hañse	 aur	
bahut	royeiñ	badla	uska	jo	kamāte	they.

arabicText: فَإِن رَّجَعَكَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَىٰ طَآئِفَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ فَٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِلْخُرُوجِ فَقُل لَّن تَخْرُجُوا۟ مَعِىَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَن تُقَـٰتِلُوا۟ مَعِىَ عَدُوًّا ۖ إِنَّكُمْ رَضِيتُم بِٱلْقُعُودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ فَٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَـٰلِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	if	Allah takes	you	back	to	a	group	of	
them	and	 they	seek	permission	 from	 you	
to	go	out	 to	 fight,	say	 to	 them,	 “You	shall	
never	go	out	with	me	nor	ever	 fight	with	
me	against	any	enemy;	you	were	happy	to	
remain	seated	for	the	first	time,	therefore	
remain	 seated	 with those	 who	 stay	
behind.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Phir	aey	Mehboob!	agar	Allah	tumheiñ		un	
meiñ	 se	 kisi	 giroh	 ki	 taraf	 wāpas	 le	 jāye	
aur	woh	 tum	 se	jihād	 ko	nikalne	 ki	ijāzat	
māñge	 to	 tum	 farmāna	 tum	 kabhi	 mere	
sāth	 na	 chalo	 aur	 hargiz	 mere	 sāth	 kisi	
dushman	 se	 na	 lado	 tum	 ne	 pehli	 daf’a	
baith	 rehna	 pasand	 kiya	 to	 baith	 raho	
peechhe	reh	jāne	wāloñ	ke	sāth

arabicText: وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	never	offer	 funeral	prayers	 for	any	of	 them	*	who	dies,	nor	stand	by	his	grave	**;	indeed	
they	disbelieved	in	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	they	died	as	sinners.	(*	It	is	forbidden	to	
offer	funeral	prayers	for	the	hypocrites.	**	To	ask	forgiveness	for	them).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 un	 meiñ	 se	 kisi	 ki	 mayyit	 par	 kabhi	
namāz	na	padhna	aur	na	uski	qabr	par	khade	hona	be-shak		woh	Allah	aur	Rasool	se	munkir	
huwe	aur	fisq	hi	meiñ	mar	gaye.

arabicText: وَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	be	surprised	at	their	wealth	or	their	children;	Allah only	wills	to	torment	them	with	
it	in	this	world,	and	that	they	pass	away	upon	disbelief.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unke	māl	 ya	aulād	par	 t’ajjub	na	 karna	Allah	 yehi	chāhta	hai	 ke	isey	duniya	meiñ	un	par	
wabāl	kare	aur	kufr	hi	par	unka	dam	nikal	jāye.

arabicText: وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ أَنْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَكَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلطَّوْلِ مِنْهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ ذَرْنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 a	 chapter	 is	 sent	 down	 that	 “Accept	 faith	 in	Allah and	 fight	 along	 with	 His	 Noble	
Messenger”,	the	men	of	means	among	them	seek	exemption	from	you	and	say,	“Leave	us,	for	us	
to	be	with	those	who	sit.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	 koi	 soorat	 utre	 ke	Allah	 par	 Imān	lāo	aur	 uske	Rasool	 ke	 hamrah	Jihād	 karo	 to	 unke	
maqdoor	(Tāqat	rakhne)	wāle	tum	se	rukhsat	māñgte	haiñ	aur	kehte	haiñ	hameiñ	chhod	dijiye	
ke	baith	rehne	wālo	ke	sāth	ho	lein

arabicText: رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	 preferred	 to	 be	 with	 the	 women	
who	 stay	 behind,	 and	 their	 hearts	 have	
been	sealed,	so	they	do	not	understand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheiñ	 pasand	 āaya	 ke	 peechhe	 rehne	
wāli	 aurtoñ	 ke	 sāth	 ho	 jāyeñ	 aur	 unke	
diloñ	par	mohar	kar	di	gayi	to	woh	kuchh	
nahi	samajhte

arabicText: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
But	 the	 Noble	 Messenger	 and	 those	 who	
accepted	faith	with	him,	fought	with	their	
wealth	 and	 lives;	 and	 for	 them	 only	 are	
the	 virtues	 (rewards);	and	it	is	 they	who	
have	achieved	the	goal.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Lekin	 Rasool	 aur	 jo	 unke	 sāth	Imān	 lāye	
unhoñ	ne	apne	mālon,	jānon	se	jihād	kiya	
aur	unhiñ	ke	liye	bhalaiyāñ	haiñ	aur	yehi	
murād	ko	pahuñche

arabicText: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	 kept	 ready	 for	 them	 Gardens	
beneath	 which	 rivers	 flow,	 abiding	 in	 it	
forever;	this	is	the	greatest	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	 ne	 unke	 liye	 tayyār	 kar	 rakhi	 haiñ	
bahishteiñ	 jinke	 neeche	 nehreiñ	 	 rawāñ	
hamesha	 un	 meiñ	 raheñge	 yehi	 badi	
murād	milni	hai

arabicText: وَجَآءَ ٱلْمُعَذِّرُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ لِيُؤْذَنَ لَهُمْ وَقَعَدَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 came	 the	 ignorant	 *	 who	 make	
excuses	 seeking	 exemption,	 and	 those	
who	 lied	 to	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messenger	 remained	 seated;	 a	 painful	
punishment	 will	 soon	 reach	 the	
disbelievers	among	them.	(*	of	faith)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 bahāne	 banāne	wāle	gañwār	āaye	 ke	
unheiñ	rukhsat	di	jāye	aur	baith	rahe	woh	
Jinhoñ	ne	Allah-o-Rasool	se	jhoot	bola	tha	
jald	un	meiñ	ke	kāfiroñ	ko	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb	
pahuñche	ga

arabicText: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلضُّعَفَآءِ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرْضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ مَا يُنفِقُونَ حَرَجٌ إِذَا نَصَحُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ مَا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ مِن سَبِيلٍۢ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
There	 is	 no	 reproach	 upon	 the	 old	 nor	
upon	the	sick	nor	upon	those	who	do	not	
have	 the	 means	 to	 spend,	 provided	 they	
remain	 faithful	 to	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messenger;	 and	 there	 is	 no	 way	 of	
reproach	against	the	virtuous;	and	Allah is	
Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful
romanUrduTranslationText:
Za'eefon	 par	 kuchh	 haraj	 nahi	aur	 na	 bimāroñ	 par	aur	 na	 un	 par	jinheiñ	 kharch	 ka	maqdoor	
(tāqat)	na	ho	jab	ke	Allah-o-Rasool	ke	khair-khwah	raheiñ	neki	wāloñ	par	koi	rāh	nahi	aur	Allah	
bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا مَآ أَتَوْكَ لِتَحْمِلَهُمْ قُلْتَ لَآ أَجِدُ مَآ أَحْمِلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ تَوَلَّوا۟ وَّأَعْيُنُهُمْ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمْعِ حَزَنًا أَلَّا يَجِدُوا۟ مَا يُنفِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Nor	 against	 those	 who	 humbly	 present	
themselves	 before	 you	in	 order	 that	 you	 provide	 them	a	mount,	and	 receive	an	answer	 from	
you	that	“I	do	not	have	any	beast	to	carry	you”	- and	so	they	turn	back	with	eyes	overflowing	
with	tears,	due	to	the	sorrow	that	they	could	not	find	the	means	to	spend.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	na	un	par	jo	tumhāre	huzoor	hāzir	hoñ ke	tum	unheiñ	sawāri	‘aṭa	farmāo tum	se	yehi	jawāb	
pāyeiñ	ke	mere	pās	koi	cheez	nahi	jis	par	tumheiñ suwār	karooñ	is	par	yuñ	wāpas	jāyeñ	ke	unki	
ānkhoñ	se	āañsu	ubalte	hoñ is	gham	se	ke	kharch	ka	magdoor	na	pāya.

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ وَهُمْ أَغْنِيَآءُ ۚ رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	way	 (of	 reproach)	is	only	against	 those	who	seek	exemption	 from	 you	although	 they	are	
rich;	they	preferred	to	be	with	the	women	who	stay	behind	- and	Allah has	sealed	their	hearts,	
so	they	do	not	know	anything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Muākhaza	(pakad)	to	un	se	hai	jo	tum	se	rukhsat	māñgte	haiñ	aur	woh	daulat	mand	haiñ	unheiñ	
pasand	āaya	ke	aurtoñ	ke	sāth	peechhe baith	raheiñ	aur	Allah	ne	unke	diloñ	par	mohar	kar	di	to	
woh	kuchh	nahi	jānte.
